name: PiggyCoinBSC
description: We're a deflationary token that builds utility around our BTC and ETH reserves. Our main goal is to onboard newbies in the friendliest and safest way, that's why we launched our NFT book (definitely for dummies) on five chains one year ago. Our new swap generates revenue that combined with our taxes allow us to grow at a slow but steady pace; We're completely sustainable because our monthly expenses are really low.
